summary: Adds the original characters of the Gauntlet arcade series to the game.
descriptionHtml:
The original characters of the popular Gauntlet arcade series as followers, Wizard, Warrior, Valkyrie, and Elf. The Wizard carries magic staffs and has a very high magica rating, but low strength and health. The Warrior is most powerful at two-handed combat and wields axes. The Valkyrie is excellent at armor and defense and carries swords and shields. The Elf has the best speed and equips bows. Due to a bug in the creation kit in which NPC in the elf races cannot be made into followers in the game, I had to use the Breton race for the Elf. Hopefully I can fix that soon.

Locations:

Wizard: College of Winterhold in Arch Mage\'s Quarters
Warrior: Ivarstead in Vilemyr Inn
Valkyrie: Solitude in Castle Dour
Elf: Riverwood in Sleeping Giant Inn

If you encounter any bugs, please report them in the comments section.
author: banzaigtv
